course_description: This course takes a sociological look at food, with a focus on sustainability. Students will study political economy, food security, and culture as it relates to food production and consumption.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4588, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: T 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: D. Shannon, Status: Closed
